pl.edu.agh.icsr.janet.util
Class ShortWrapper

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--pl.edu.agh.icsr.janet.util.ShortWrapper
public class ShortWrapper
extends java.lang.Object

Mutable wrapper for short value. Since it is mutable, it may be used for passing short values by reference (unlike java.lang.Short).

Field Summary
 short val
          wrapped, mutable short value.
 
Constructor Summary
ShortWrapper()
          Constructs a new wrapper with a zero value.

          Constructs a new wrapper with given value.
